item.title: 咨询费创纪录，交易反弹，杰富瑞季度利润上升
item.description: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）周一公布了第三季度利润增长报告，创纪录的咨询费和交易量的反弹让投资者提前了解了华尔街投资银行业务在本财季的表现。【原文：Jefferies reported higher third-quarter profit on Monday, as record advisory fees and a rebound in dealmaking gave investors an early read on how Wall Street's investment-banking business may perform this earnings season.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，OpenAI 的新 Sora 视频生成器将要求版权持有者选择退出
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士的话报道，OpenAI 正计划发布其 Sora 生成器的新版本，该生成器可创建包含版权材料的视频，除非权利人选择不让其作品出现在视频中。【原文：OpenAI is planning to release a new version of its Sora generator that creates videos featuring copyrighted material, unless right holders opt out of having their work appear, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 墨西哥肉类行业谴责新的牲畜移动规则和伊维菌素防治螺旋虫的要求
item.description: 随着墨西哥与美国因爆发食肉螺旋虫寄生虫疫情而紧张关系升温，墨西哥肉类行业正在反击政府对牲畜移动的新规定。【原文：Mexico's meat industry is pushing back against new government regulations on livestock movement as tensions with the United States heat up over an outbreak of the flesh-eating screwworm parasite.】

item.title: 詹妮弗-加纳的婴儿食品公司 Once Upon a Farm 申请在美国上市
item.description: 有机婴儿食品公司 Once Upon a Farm 周一提交了在美国首次公开募股的申请。【原文：Organic baby food company Once Upon a Farm on Monday filed for an initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: Beyond Meat 发起可转换债务交换要约后股价跌至历史新低
item.description: 周一，Beyond Meat 的股价跌至历史新低，此前这家植物肉生产商发起了可转换债券的交换要约，以削减 8 亿多美元的债务。【原文：Shares of Beyond Meat slumped to a record low on Monday after the maker of plant-based meat launched an exchange offer for convertible bonds to cut more than $800 million in debt.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨莱姆：对进一步削减持开放态度，但必须谨慎
item.description: 圣路易斯联储主席阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆（Alberto Musalem）表示，他对进一步降息持开放态度，但美联储必须谨慎行事，保持足够高的利率，以继续抵御仍比央行2%的目标高出约一个百分点的通货膨胀。【原文：St. Louis Federal Reserve President Alberto Musalem said he was open to further interest rate cuts but the Fed must be cautious and keep rates high enough to continue to lean against inflation that remains roughly a percentage point above the central bank's 2% target.】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯称降息旨在刺激就业市场
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）周一表示，劳动力市场新出现的疲软迹象促使他在最近一次央行会议上支持降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said Monday that emerging signs of weakness in the labor market drove his support for cutting interest rates at the most recent central bank meeting.】

item.title: 对冲基金桥水为招聘计划从五个国家挑选竞赛优胜者
item.description: 由亿万富翁雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）创立的对冲基金桥水联合公司（Bridgewater Associates）在路透社看到的一段视频中说，该对冲基金已从四大洲挑选出五名入围人才计划的选手，他们将获得 2.5 万美元的奖金和一份潜在的工作。【原文：Bridgewater Associates, the hedge fund founded by billionaire Ray Dalio, has selected five finalists from four continents for a talent program that offers $25,000 awards and a potential job, the hedge fund said in a video seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 如果美国政府关门，华尔街将对美国数据一无所知
item.description: 如果美国政府即将关门，华尔街正在为经济数据的中断做准备，这可能会导致投资者更加依赖替代数据，或在预期资产价格波动的情况下采取更多的防御性仓位。【原文：Wall Street is preparing for disruption to economic data if a looming U.S. government shutdown goes ahead, which could cause investors to rely more on alternative data or take on more defensive positions as they anticipate volatility in asset prices.】

item.title: OpenAI 与 Etsy 和 Shopify 合作开发 ChatGPT 支付结账系统
item.description: OpenAI 周一与 Etsy 和 Shopify 合作推出了一项功能，允许用户通过 ChatGPT 进行购物。【原文：OpenAI on Monday introduced a feature that would allow users to make purchases through ChatGPT, in partnership with Etsy and Shopify .】

item.title: 法拉利主席与母亲就阿涅利遗产问题面临新的法律斗争
item.description: 法拉利和 Stellantis 董事长约翰-埃尔坎（John Elkann）与其母亲面临着一场新的官司，因为他母亲的律师周一提交了一份此前未公开的手写遗嘱修正案，内容涉及其父亲、已故的詹尼-阿涅利（Gianni Agnelli）的遗嘱。【原文：Ferrari and Stellantis chair John Elkann faces a new legal battle with his mother after her lawyers on Monday presented what they said was a previously undisclosed handwritten amendment to the will of her father, the late Gianni Agnelli.】

item.title: Anthropic 推出 Claude 4.5，吹嘘功能更强，目标客户是企业用户
item.description: Anthropic 周一发布了 Claude 4.5 人工智能模型，称最新版本可以更长时间地不间断编码，并能更好地处理金融和科学任务，因为这家初创公司正在深入企业人工智能领域。【原文：Anthropic unveiled the Claude 4.5 AI model on Monday, saying the newest version can code for longer uninterrupted stretches and handle finance and scientific tasks better, as the startup pushes deeper into enterprise AI.】

item.title: 美国上诉法院称，Hain Celestial 必须重新面对 "渠道填充 "诉讼
item.description: 联邦上诉法院周一恢复了一项诉讼，指控海恩天体集团（Hain Celestial Group）欺诈股东，隐瞒所谓的 "渠道填充 "计划，以抬高收入和股价。【原文：A federal appeals court revived a lawsuit on Monday accusing Hain Celestial Group of defrauding shareholders by concealing an alleged "channel stuffing" scheme to inflate revenue and its stock price.】

item.title: 美国参议员敦促相关机构调查特斯拉全自动驾驶汽车在铁路道口的应对措施
item.description: 两位美国参议员周一敦促汽车安全监管机构调查特斯拉全自动驾驶系统在检测和安全应对铁路道口方面的故障报告。【原文：Two U.S. senators on Monday urged auto safety regulators to investigate reported failures of Tesla’s Full Self-Driving system to detect and safely respond to railroad crossings.】

item.title: 道明银行重申中期增长目标，重点关注高收费细分市场
item.description: 道明银行周一预测，未来四年的股本回报率约为 16%，恢复了 12 月份暂停的增长目标，因为道明银行因反洗钱违规被美国处以 30 亿美元的历史性罚款。【原文：TD Bank on Monday forecast return on equity of about 16% for the next four years, reinstating a growth target it suspended in December as it recovered from a historic $3 billion fine in the United States for anti-money laundering failings.】

item.title: 企业寻求更低成本资金，可转换债券交易激增至五年新高
item.description: 2025 年，全球企业正在利用股市的强劲走势和投资者对混合债务的偏好，加大可转换债券的发行力度，其中科技和成长型企业正在筹集资金，以避免高昂的借贷成本。【原文：Global companies are ramping up convertible bond issuance in 2025, taking advantage of strong equity markets and investor appetite for hybrid debt, with tech and growth firms raising funds to avoid high borrowing costs.】

item.title: Frontier和Allegiant首席执行官将在美国参议院航空竞争听证会上作证
item.description: 美国国会助理表示，低成本航空公司 Allegiant Airlines 和 Frontier Airlines 的首席执行官将于周二在美国参议院司法部门反垄断小组委员会就航空公司竞争问题作证。【原文：The chief executives of low-cost carriers Allegiant Airlines and Frontier Airlines will testify before a U.S. Senate Judiciary antitrust subcommittee on Tuesday on air carrier competition, congressional aides said.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，瑞士和瑞银可能就资本规则达成妥协
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，瑞士和瑞银私下表示愿意在资本规则上做出妥协，这可能会为议会达成政府和银行都能接受的较低要求铺平道路。【原文：Switzerland and UBS are signalling in private a willingness to compromise on capital rules, potentially paving the way for parliament to settle on lower requirements acceptable to the government and the bank, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 如果政府关门，将不公布美国 9 月就业报告
item.description: 美国劳工部周一表示，如果政府部分关门，其统计机构将暂停发布经济数据，包括备受关注的 9 月份月度就业报告。【原文：The U.S. Labor Department said on Monday its statistics agency would suspend economic data releases, including the closely watched monthly employment report for September, in the event of a partial government shutdown.】

item.title: 私募股权基金和主权财富基金重振大型杠杆收购
item.description: 在私募股权公司和主权财富基金瞄准备受瞩目的科技、媒体和消费类公司的推动下，杠杆收购在经历了多年的低迷后强势卷土重来。【原文：Leveraged buyouts are making a strong comeback after years of muted activity, fueled by private equity firms and sovereign wealth funds targeting high-profile technology, media and consumer companies.】

item.title: PG&E公布730亿美元支出计划，满足数据中心激增的能源需求
item.description: 美国公用事业公司 PG&E Corp 周一表示，计划到 2030 年斥资 730 亿美元进行输电升级，以满足数据中心带动的电力需求激增。【原文：U.S.-based utility PG&E Corp said on Monday it plans to spend $73 billion by 2030 for transmission upgrades to meet the data center-led surge in electricity demand.】

item.title: 加拿大西捷航空公司称部分乘客数据在网络安全漏洞中暴露
item.description: 加拿大航空公司西捷航空（WestJet）周一表示，部分乘客的个人信息在今年早些时候的一次网络安全漏洞事件中被曝光，但没有支付数据被泄露。【原文：Canadian carrier WestJet said on Monday the personal information of some passengers was exposed in a cybersecurity breach earlier this year, though no payment data was compromised.】

item.title: 独家报道：激进派 Irenic 增持 Workiva 股份，力争董事会席位
item.description: Irenic Capital Management 公司持有大量 Workiva 的股份，认为这家财务报告软件制造商需要提高运营效率，更新董事会，并考虑出售的可能性。【原文：Irenic Capital Management built a sizable stake in Workiva , arguing the financial reporting software maker needs to improve its operating efficiency, refresh its board and consider a potential sale.】

item.title: 美国 8 月成屋待售在低抵押贷款利率下反弹
item.description: 由于较低的抵押贷款利率将购房者重新拉回市场，8 月份美国旧房销售稳健增长，但劳动力市场的疲软可能会抑制销售的进一步增长。【原文：Sales of previously owned U.S. homes increased solidly in August as lower mortgage rates pulled buyers back into the market, though a softening labor market could curb further gains.】

item.title: 加拿大宣布为阿尔戈马钢铁公司提供 4 亿加元财政援助
item.description: 加拿大就业部长帕蒂-哈伊杜（Patty Hajdu）周一表示，加拿大政府将根据其大型企业关税减免计划向阿尔戈马钢铁公司提供 4 亿加元（2.8713 亿美元）的财政支持。【原文：Canada's government is to provide C$400 million ($287.13 million) in financial support for Algoma Steel under its large enterprise tariff relief scheme, Jobs Minister Patty Hajdu said on Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普称将提供家具关税细节
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一表示，在上周宣布对家具进口征收高达 50%的关税后，即将公布有关细节。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday said details were forthcoming on tariffs for furniture imports, after announcing levies of up to 50% on such goods last week.】

item.title: 嘉年华因邮轮需求而上调年度利润预期
item.description: 嘉年华公司（Carnival Corp）上调了年度利润预期，押注于强劲的需求、更高的船上消费以及邮轮假期的票价。【原文：Carnival Corp , raised its annual forecast for profit, betting on strong demand and higher onboard spending as well as ticket pricing for its cruise vacations.】

item.title: 艾伯维将以美国价格在英国推出卵巢癌药物
item.description: 艾伯维周一表示，将在英国推出卵巢癌药物Elahere，上市价格与美国持平。【原文：AbbVie said on Monday it would launch its ovarian cancer drug Elahere in the UK at a list price equal to that in the U.S.】

item.title: 美国将对境外制作的电影征收 100% 的关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一在 Truth Social 上发表文章称，美国将对所有在境外制作的电影征收 100% 的关税。【原文：The United States will impose a 100% tariff on all movies made outside the country, U.S. President Donald Trump said in a post on Truth Social on Monday.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）为节约成本，将资本支出预期每年削减 10 亿美元
item.description: 法国石油巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）周一将其到 2030 年的年度资本支出指引下调了 10 亿美元，这也是其 75 亿美元节支计划的一部分。【原文：French oil major TotalEnergies on Monday reduced its annual capital expenditure guidance by $1 billion through 2030 as part of a $7.5 billion savings drive.】
